attributes.action: SCRAP THE BENDY BUSES IN THE UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE BENDY BUSES  CAUSE MORE PROBLEMS THAN THEY ARE WORTH. THEY ARE OK IN CENTRAL EUROPE. BUT OUR ROADS ARE NO GOOD FOR THEM. THEY ARE DANGEROUS.BRING BACK THE ROUTE MASTERS.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
